> Kup jumped to his seat and started to scan the area as well he started to run the security sistem and the shield

The security system are running just fine. All lights are green and
everything is showing in full readiness. The shield is also showing no
problem. Its integrity is holding at 100% with only nominal
fluctuations. There are no recorded breaches, and all appears normal.

As the grey dot appears its position is sporadic and mobile, however
it never appears on the inside of the shield, only the outside. As the
computer monitors its position it appears to be following Tuscon and
Lord Elder, although it never gets too close to them.

Then, almost as if what ever it is becomes aware of the sudden
scrutiny from the Ark's sensors, the dot suddenly disappears from all
sensors.

(TAG)

Preston
